alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Collier, northern Hendry and southwestern Glades Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Devils Garden to near Immokalee. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Ave Maria, Montura, Immokalee, Golden Gate Estates, Felda, Port La Belle, Devils Garden, Big Corkscrew Island, Ortona, Orangetree, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Bunker Hill, Keri and Lake Trafford. LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
